data.Name: The Ghost of Paul Revere
data.Bio: The Ghost of Paul Revere is a holler folk band from Portland, Maine centered around the three part harmonies of life long friends Max Davis, Sean McCarthy, and Griffin Sherry.They formed in 2011 with the additions of Matthew Baker and Matt Young. They are a band dedicated to writing powerful, stripped down music that is meant to be experienced live and intimately. Believe in the Ghost The Ghost of Paul Revere on Bandcamp Read more on Last.fm
